column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////The food is good
column2: but nothing blew my mind.  We got the Chicken and Biscuit and it looked a lot better than it tasted.  It was good
column3: but it was so heavy and lacked flavor.  The batter on the chicken was excellent
column4: wished we got more chicken and less biscuit.  The Spicy Boudin Benedict was good
column5: but was also very heavy.  The Boudin was the best I've ever had and I found out it's made in house.
